methods.name: rpc.discover
methods.description: OpenRPC schema as a description of this service

schema.title: health
schema.description: Health status of the server and database connection.

metric.title: Metric family
metric.description: A prometheus gauge, summary, or histogram metric

dynamic.description: Dynamic node information available through events at runtime.

static.description: Static node information available at startup.

dynamic.description: Dynamic node information available through events at runtime.

connections.description: Peers and their addresses that are connected to the node

static.description: Static node information available at startup.

peer_id.description: The peer ID of the node

peers.description: Peers discovered by peer ID and multiaddress
Peers discovered by peer ID and multiaddresses

server.description: Server that fulfilled the discovery request

quorum.description: Number of peers required for quorum
Number of peers participating in quorum
Number of peers required for quorum
Number of peers participating in quorum

await_result.title: Await result
await_result.description: Branches of a promise that is awaited

ipld_link.title: IPLD link
ipld_link.description: CID link that points to some IPLD data

pointer.description: CID reference to an invocation, task, instruction, or receipt

resources.description: Resource configuration for fuel quota, memory allowance, and timeout

run.title: Run instruction
run.description: An instruction that runs a function from a resource, executor that will run the function, inputs to the executor, and optional nonce

args.description: Arguments to the function. May await a result from another task.

func.description: The function to call on the Wasm resource

nnc.description: A 12-byte or 16-byte nonce. Use empty string for no nonce.

task.description: Contains a run instruction, configuration, optional reference to receipt that caused task to run, and authorization

x-messages.name: workflow subscription messages
x-messages.summary: receipt notifications from a running workflow

schema.title: Receipt notification
schema.description: A receipt notification associated with a running workflow

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Workflow metadata to contextualize the receipt

ipld_link.title: IPLD link
ipld_link.description: CID link that points to some IPLD data

out.title: Computation result
out.description: Result tuple with ok/err/just result and associated output

pointer.description: CID reference to an invocation, task, instruction, or receipt

meta.title: Receipt metadata
meta.description: Receipt metadata including the operation that produced the receipt
